messages: Whoo! KHP wants the rest of my manuscript. I shall send it tomorrow.
Whoo! KHP wants the rest of my manuscript. I shall send it tomorrow.
Full manuscript sent to the editor and my hardest proofing job to date sent back to my client. Whew!
